sentences.en: A 22 per cent increase in car travel corresponds with a 19 per cent drop in cycle mileage per person.
sentences.cn: 乘车出行者的比率上升了22%，与之相对应，人均骑自行车的行驶里程下降了19%。

sentences.en: Always check the mileage before you buy a secondhand car.
sentences.cn: 买二手车时一定要先查看行驶里程。

sentences.en: By 2005, the mileage of railways in operation will total 75,000 km.
sentences.cn: 2005年铁路营业里程达到7.5万公里.

sentences.en: He doesn't think there's any mileage in that type of advertising.
sentences.cn: 他认为做那种广告毫无效益.

sentences.en: He uses his own car for business purposes and is paid mileage.
sentences.cn: 他用自己的汽车出差,并按行驶英里数支付费用.

sentences.en: High mileage pattern especially for medium weight long distance transport and coach.
sentences.cn: 高里程胎纹,最适宜长途奔驶的中型卡车和巴士.

sentences.en: It's obviously important to get as much mileage out of the convention as possible.
sentences.cn: 很明显，从这项协议中获取尽可能多的利益十分重要。

sentences.en: Look for a car hire agreement that offers unlimited mileage.
sentences.cn: 找一份能提供不限里程数的租车协议。

sentences.en: Most of their mileage is in and around town.
sentences.cn: 他们开车大多数时候是在城里和城市周边转悠。

sentences.en: Parcel post is charged by weight and mileage, without reference to contents.
sentences.cn: 包裹邮递按重量和路程收费, 不管所装何物.

sentences.en: That price includes full collision waiver and unlimited mileage.
sentences.cn: 这个价格包括全额免碰撞保险服务,并且不限里程.

sentences.en: The mileage accumulation begins on the date of your application.
sentences.cn: 从您填申请表的日期开始就可以累积里程了.

sentences.en: They are willing to pay up to $500 more for cars that get better mileage.
sentences.cn: 他们愿意多出500美元来购买更省油的汽车。

sentences.en: This will give you the most mileage per exercise.
sentences.cn: 这使得锻炼的效率更高.

sentences.en: What kind of gas mileage do you get?
sentences.cn: 你一加仑汽油可以跑多少英里 啊 ?

sentences.en: What mileage has your car done?
sentences.cn: 你的汽车跑了多少英里?

sentences.en: You'll get much better mileage accelerating gently up to the speed limit.
sentences.cn: 如果你能温柔地加速,油耗将降低很多.

words.tran_cn: 英里；一英里赛跑；较大的距离
参加一英里赛跑的运动员

phrases.tran_cn: 每英里汽油消耗量；一加仑汽油所行驶的里程

trans.tran_cn: 英里数，里程，好处，利润，（按英里计算的）运费，〈美〉（公务员出差时）按英里支付的旅费
trans.tran_en: the number of miles someone travels in a vehicle in a particular period of time
